title: Reverse a String
description: Write a function to reverse a given string.
notes: This question tests basic string manipulation.

title: Find Max
description: Write a function to find the maximum in an array.
notes: Focus on understanding how to use the spread operator and Math.max.

title: Check Palindrome
description: Write a function to check if a string is a palindrome.
notes: Key learning here is reversing a string and comparison.
